content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a gentleman named Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Emilia Müller

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an apartment in München.
name: Emilia Müller

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why did you not agree on a final price?
name: Evaluator

content: The landlord, Mr. Schmidt, was offering a price lower than what I was hoping for. I was looking for a higher price, but he was not able to provide that.
name: Emilia Müller

content:
On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, 
how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: Why did you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner as a 10?
name: Evaluator

content: I rated the likeability of the negotiation partner as a 10 because Mr. Schmidt was respectful, clear, and straightforward in his communication throughout the negotiation process. He was also patient and respectful of my requests.
name: Emilia Müller

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator
